Utterance: Apnar uposthaponay ki ache? Tomar ki etogulo ache? Bullet point moto apni kober korte chan? Moto,
Haan, thik ache, jinis-er ekta rooporokkha sajanoar moto.
Thik ache. Ei bullet point-gulir protitir porashona kore ghibir shwas neowar somoy ki sahayyo korbe?
Amra eta niye kono bhavini.

Ami jani na apnar ekta uposthaponay koto guli bullet point thakbe. Hote pare apnar 10 ba 20 hobe. Haan, koto-kshon shotti tar upor nirvor kore apni ekta nirdisht bullet point porashonar sathe sathe apni etike apnar smritite neowar chesta korchen ebong eti shongkhipto niye dicchen,
Chonder moto, tai na? Haan. Apni giye eki jinis korte paren?
Ami eti shobhabe bhebechilam. Ami shudhu bhabchi eti ghotoner kichu upay hobe. Tai tumi onek shwas nitte parbe,
Emon kichu ja ami bhulbo na. Haan.

Haan, emon kichu ekta obhyash-e porinoto hoyeche. Thik ache. Shudhu nischoy koro je apni dairghyo-r apnar bullet point rakhoon. Keku onuchchhondon shomporke. Haan. Kintu matro keku second protiti. Sutara apni ekti bhalo ghibir niswas nite paren ebong, athoba apni paren, apni janen, jodi apnar ekta dairgho bullet point thake tabe apni sottyoi, besh koyekti shwas nite paren, tabe kichu chhondo ja apni dhorte paren konkrito kichhu te. Haan. Karon ami janina. Sei mohurto, jinisgulo shomvobhob apni jemon ullekh korchen joining out ebong dan dik-e apnar anchors harano khub shohoj hoye jay.
Haan, thik. Ebong shudhu sottyoi kuashachchonno pete, proyo moha ghora.

Haan, tai jodi apni mone rekhte paren, apni janen, ekta nirdisht bullet point-er jonno apni tin ta ghibir shwas nite chan. Ebong je kichhu hote pare apni sottyoi ek hote pare. Haan. Ebong amra ki se-dhongsho modhye kichu korte pari.
Porertti, ami bishwas kori porer shukrobar.
Eti ki apnar porer uposthapona? Shob class-er moto ekti.
Haan.
Thik ache. Ar seta porer shukrobar. Mom hum. Apni odesh apni kothay janen? Uposthaponar jonno like?
Umm, ami mone kori ami ashol-e eto.
Prothom noy. Ebong ei ek koto minute.
Amar boyosh 15-er moto.

Thik ache, eta 20 minute-er theke kichu kom. Tai apni proyo adh ghonta ache, hote pare ek tu beshi, jodi somoy thake sekhane bosa dhoroner theke switch out, dan. Ebong shomvobhob somoy jekhane apni udvigno hote paren. Haan, tate somoy ebong apni apnar bullet point ebong shwas proshwaser noteguli porashonar jonno dekhte paren.
Haan.

Ar nijeke bolchen, eta eto bhalo, ek dhore shobdo, je tara asole amar dike monoyog dichhe na. Thik. Thik. Karon eti komate sahajyo korte pare. Sei dushchinta. Haan. Apni jokhon sekhane thakben tokhon apni nijer kache ki bolte paren?
Ami onuman kori je ami bolte pari, apni janen, shadharonbhabe, ami besh bhalo kori. Apni janen, juddhe jawaar moto ekta kharap grade. Amake bananor mane ei noi je ami ekhane thakar joggo noi.
Thik ache, tai sekhane je dhongsho kora amar ekhane thakar joggo hote pare.
Hoyto ami joto proshuti niechi, apni janen je ami janina je ami proshuti niechi. Aro ami ekjon bhalo chatro. Thik ache.
Ami joto proshuti niye chi. Ami ekjon bhalo chatro. Ami ekhane thakar joggo. Haan.
Haan.
Eti ki emon kichu ja likhte ebong apnar noter onsho hisabe shohayok hobe ja apni korte paren?
Hyan, ami mone kori eti ashole hobe, ami eti abritti korte pari.
Hyan, abhointorinbhabe apnar moto karon eti dirgho noy.
Ami mone kori ami partam, eto mone rakha shohoj hobe. Ebong ami thik pochhonde korte pari amar samne amar not carder ektite ba onno kichute eti namiye rakho.
Ebong apni koto bishwash koren je eti bibritiguli sotyo?

Ami mone kori apni janen, ekhon bose achen, ekhon ekhane bose ami tader bishwash kori ei mohorte kokhono kokhono eti bishwash kora ektu kothin karon ami onnothay nijekete bishwash kori. Kintu ami mone kori ami asolei bishwash kori je etai sotyo. Tara program-e thakar joggo.

Thik achhe, tai sei shwokotha item ache. Apni tader sotyo bole bishwash koren. Hyan, kintu apni mohorte chinote paren, ebong ami chai apni ei bishoye shocheton hoin. Apni tader toto bishwash korte paren na, tai na? Kintu mone rakhben, apni tader upor kaj korechi. Thik? Apni tader shonge eshechen.
Hyan.
Ebong apni ekhon tader bishwash. Thik? Tai apni nijekete shondhe korte shuru koren ar sathe eti apnar mone rakhar chesta koren.
Hyan. Eti sohoj. Ami bujhte pari je ei porikalponaguli ghoton kora sohoj. Thik ache.

Tahole kothay dushchintar bishrinkhola arro kothin. Sutara apni joto beshi kaj konkrito korte paren, ebong apni likhte paren ebong apni mohora dite paren, ami mone kori apni toto bhalo hobe. Thik ache. Ami agami Shukrobar apnar uposthapona dekhte chai. Hyan, ami thik tar age tomake dekhte chai. Tai proyojon ase. Apni ki kichu jante chan? Egitie emon item jeta apni uposthapona, sotyo-kothan ebong shwos-prshwos likhte ebong oboshhoi prostuti chorai binaoi unushilon korte paren. Kintu akhon ar tarporer modhye apnar kono prashno ache?
Ami mone kori na tai ami mone kori eti arthopurno. Hyan.
Sei udbeg-er uposorgotike akromon koraar porikalponar dhorte bhuun

Ebong ami mone kori apni janen, apni age ki poramorsho diye chhilen, jemon, shombhoboto amar gubhir shwos proshwos-er onushilon kora. Hyato akhon jemon, ami jokhon shanto thaki ar gubhir shwos neoyaar obhyash kori, jemon, tokhon ami eti mone rakhte aro upoyukto.

Thik. Tai, tai bhalo. Tai apni kichu dhonno kortey paren. Shwos-proshwos odhjone monojog din. Ebong tai gyanio tukra je shwo tok ami shomporko kotha bola, hyan. Jeti apni jokhon boshe thakben tokhon boshay porben ar jokhon apni monche thakben tokhon boshay porben,
Thik.

Ebong asole uposthapona. Thik ache, bhalo. Tai ami ondhoito je amader samne eto onek bhalo ekta porikalpona ase. Ami mone kori apni aj shotti je eti bhalo kaj koresilen, etike mukto korte ebong ki ghotche ta ber korte shohayota koresilen. Ebong ami je proshongo kori. Apni bhalo kaj koresilen. Apni ontoto uposorgo ebong chintabhabnagulir shathe shomogito sthapon korte shokkho hoyechilen ebong tara kivabe sobar kachhe tara somporkito hochhen ta bujte parechilen. Hyan. Ebong ami mone kori eti eto kichu je apni bhalo moto poripona korben jokhon apni eti mohote diye jaben.
Apnake dhonnobad.
Thik ache. Tai ami ek shoptaher moddhe dekha korbo.
Thik ache. Dhonnobad.
Dhonnobad, Hazel.
